name: Dr. U and the Communist Space Monkeys
name_original: Dr. U and the Communist Space Monkeys
description:
Our entry for Asylum Jam 2015

They arrived and you have to get out now!

Use your umbrella to shoot and smack monkeys!

Dont stand in the fire!

Whistle along.

**Controls**

W / Up = Jump

A / Left = Run left

D / Right = Run right

Space = Shoot/Smack

Made in 48 hours for the Asylum Jam 2015 #asylumjam2015

by @farwyler, @shakemeluzifer
